languages.text: "В артефакте гемункула была лишь непроглядная тьма, но улицы Темного города не намного светлее — я почти слепну от боли в его иссиня-черной дымке". {n}Кассия хмурится, рассматривая пляшущие в углах тени.{/n} "Сгустки бурого и темно-зеленого смешиваются с оседающим пеплом отчаяния, вплетаясь в гобелен из всех оттенков тьмы".

traits.locale_text: "В артефакте Гемункула была лишь непроглядная тьма, но улицы темного Города не намного светлее — я почти слепну от боли в его иссиня-черной дымке". {n}Кассия хмурится, рассматривая пляшущие в углах тени.{/n} "Сгустки бурого и темно-зеленого смешиваются с оседающим пеплом отчаяния, вплетаясь в гобелен из всех оттенков тьмы".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."
languages.original_text: "В артефакте гемункула была лишь непроглядная тьма, но улицы Темного города не намного светлее — я почти слепну от боли в его иссиня-черной дымке". {n}Кассия хмурится, рассматривая пляшущие в углах тени.{/n} "Сгустки бурого и темно-зеленого смешиваются с оседающим пеплом отчаяния, вплетаясь в гобелен из всех оттенков тьмы".

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “血伶人的建筑之中只有漆黑一片，但即便是到了黑暗之城的街道上，也几乎看不到任何颜色。整个街道都笼罩在蓝黑色的阴霾中，痛苦几乎蒙蔽了我的双眼。”{n}卡西娅皱着眉头，看着角落中舞动的影子。{/n}“褐色与深绿色的肿块，以及代表苦难的灰色混合在一起。所有的颜色编织在一起，构成了一块阴暗的织锦。”
languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

traits.locale_text: “血伶人的建筑之中只有漆黑一片，但即便是到了黑暗之城的街道上，也几乎看不到任何颜色。整个街道都笼罩在蓝黑色的阴霾中，痛苦几乎蒙蔽了我的双眼。”{n}卡西娅皱着眉头，看着角落中舞动的影子。{/n}“褐色与深绿色的肿块，以及代表苦难的灰色混合在一起。所有的颜色编织在一起，构成了一块阴暗的织锦。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

languages.text: «En el artefacto del Hemónculo no había más que oscuridad, pero las calles de la Ciudad Siniestra no ofrecen mucha más luz. Es una neblina azul, casi negra, que me ciega de dolor». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y mira cómo las sombras bailan en los rincones.{/n} «Hay aglomeraciones de marrón y verde que se mezclan con el gris cenizo de la miseria, todo ello atado en un tapiz hecho de todos los tonos posibles de la oscuridad».
languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

traits.locale_text: «En el artefacto del Hemónculo no había más que oscuridad, pero las calles de la Ciudad Siniestra no ofrecen mucha más luz. Es una neblina azul, casi negra, que me ciega de dolor». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y mira cómo las sombras bailan en los rincones.{/n} «Hay aglomeraciones de marrón y verde que se mezclan con el gris cenizo de la miseria, todo ello atado en un tapiz hecho de todos los tonos posibles de la oscuridad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ハモンキュラスのアーティファクトの中は真っ暗でしたが、仄暗き都の通りにはもう光がほとんどありません。その青黒い靄の中で、私は痛みに目がくらみそうになるのです」{n}カシアは眉をひそめながら、隅に踊る影を見ている。{/n}「褐色と深緑の塊が、不幸の灰と混ざり合い、あらゆる色合いの闇のタペストリーに織り込まれています」
languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「ハモンキュラスのアーティファクトの中は真っ暗でしたが、仄暗き都の通りにはもう光がほとんどありません。その青黒い靄の中で、私は痛みに目がくらみそうになるのです」{n}カシアは眉をひそめながら、隅に踊る影を見ている。{/n}「褐色と深緑の塊が、不幸の灰と混ざり合い、あらゆる色合いの闇のタペストリーに織り込まれています」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Im Artefakt des Haemonculus gab es nichts als pechschwarze Dunkelheit. Doch auch in den Straßen der Dunklen Stadt gibt es kaum mehr Licht, ihr blau-schwarzer Nebel blendet mich fast vor Schmerzen." {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn, während sie beobachten, wie die Schatten in den Ecken tanzen.{/n} "Klumpen aus Braun und Grün vermischen sich mit der fallenden Asche des Leids, alle zu einem Wandteppich in sämtlichen Schattierungen der Dunkelheit verwebt."
languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Im Artefakt des Haemonculus gab es nichts als pechschwarze Dunkelheit. Doch auch in den Straßen der Dunklen Stadt gibt es kaum mehr Licht, ihr blau-schwarzer Nebel blendet mich fast vor Schmerzen." {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn, während sie beobachten, wie die Schatten in den Ecken tanzen.{/n} "Klumpen aus Braun und Grün vermischen sich mit der fallenden Asche des Leids, alle zu einem Wandteppich in sämtlichen Schattierungen der Dunkelheit verwebt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Des ténèbres insondables régnaient dans l'artefact de l'hémoncule, mais il n'y a pas beaucoup plus de lumière dans les rues de la Cité Crépusculaire, dont le brouillard bleu-noir m'aveugle. » {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils en observant les ombres danser dans les coins.{/n} « Des panaches marron et vert foncé viennent se mêler au malheur cendré pour former une tapisserie regroupant toutes les nuances des ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Des ténèbres insondables régnaient dans l'artefact de l'hémoncule, mais il n'y a pas beaucoup plus de lumière dans les rues de la Cité Crépusculaire, dont le brouillard bleu-noir m'aveugle. » {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils en observant les ombres danser dans les coins.{/n} « Des panaches marron et vert foncé viennent se mêler au malheur cendré pour former une tapisserie regroupant toutes les nuances des ténèbres. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Haimonkulus'un eserinin içi kapkaranlıktı. Kara Şehir'in sokaklarında da daha fazla ışık olduğu söylenemez. Buradaki mavimtırak, siyahımsı pusta çektiğim acıdan kör olmama ramak kaldı." {n}Cassia, köşe bucakta dans eden gölgeleri izlerken somurtuyor.{/n} "Rengi küle çalan bir ızdırap, kahverengi ve koyu yeşil yumrularla harmanlanmış... Her şey, karanlığın tüm tonlarıyla iç içe örülmüş."
languages.original_text: "There was only pitch darkness inside the Haemonculus's artefact, but there is scarcely any more light in the streets of the Dark City, in whose blue-black haze I am almost blinded by pain." {n}Cassia frowns as she watches the shadows dancing in the corners.{/n} "Clumps of brown and dark green blend with the settling ash of misery, all woven together in a tapestry of every shade of darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Haimonkulus'un eserinin içi kapkaranlıktı. Kara Şehrin sokaklarında da daha fazla ışık olduğu söylenemez. Buradaki mavimtırak, siyahımtırak pusta çektiğim acıdan kör olmama ramak kaldı." {n}Cassia, köşe bucakta dans eden gölgeleri izlerken somurtuyor.{/n} "Rengi küle çalan bir ızdırap, kahverengi ve koyu yeşil yumrularla harmanlanmış... Her şey, karanlığın tüm tonlarıyla iç içe örülmüş."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
